Entity.Description: This table stores transactional constraints automatically created by the system. Transactional constraints are temporary in nature, and are automatically purged by the system when the corresponding transaction data is purged. When tasks are suggested to a user, these constraints have to be met. If no constraints are specified here, it means that any type of task can be suggested to the user.
Entity.Name: Auto_User_Constraints

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute.
Attribute.Name: Auto_User_Constraints_Key

Attribute.Description: Owner organization of the node.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: User for whom transactional constraints are being defined.
Attribute.Name: Assigned_To_User_Id

Attribute.Description: Within a Node, operations can vary by Enterprise. Therefore, Task Type level attributes are maintained at Enterprise level for a Node.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Key

Attribute.Description: Identifies the task type that the user is eligible to perform.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: Identifies the batch for which user is currently performing a task.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: Identifies the shipment for which user is currently performing a task.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_No

Attribute.Description: Identifies the container for which user is currently performing a task.
Attribute.Name: Container_No

Attribute.Description: Y or blank: If the constraint should be applied. N: If the constraint should not be used for further processing.
Attribute.Name: Active_Flag

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the batches of tasks. A batch of tasks is typically sized such that it takes one user around 30 minutes to complete.
Entity.Name: Batch

Attribute.Description: the primary key of the YFS_BATCH table.
Attribute.Name: Batch_Key

Attribute.Description: The node's organization code.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The batch number associated with the node.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: The type of the task. A batch can only contain tasks of the same task type. This attribute marks task type for all tasks within this batch.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: The shipment number associated with this batch.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_No

Attribute.Description: The status of the Batch.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The field stores the input XML passed for completing the batch (input to registerBatchCompletion) when running in offline mode.
Attribute.Name: Requested_Batch_Completion_XML

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the batch is created by the system or manually by the user.
Attribute.Name: Manually_Created

Attribute.Description: Indicates the estimated time required to complete all the open tasks.
Attribute.Name: Remaining_Minutes

Attribute.Description: The equipment type is used to move product within a warehouse. For exampe, cart.
Attribute.Name: Equipment_Type

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores batch rules. Batching algorithm applies these constraints during batch creation. Batch rules can be specified at node level.
Entity.Name: Batch_Rule

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute.
Attribute.Name: Batch_Rule_Key

Attribute.Description: Owner organization of the node.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Maximum number of tasks for the PrimaryTaskReference that a batch can have.
Attribute.Name: Max_Transactions

Attribute.Description: Maximum volume that a batch can have.
Attribute.Name: Max_Volume

Attribute.Description: Maximum number of tasks that a batch can have.
Attribute.Name: Max_Tasks

Attribute.Description: This field is used in conjunction with Max Transactions field. If the Max Transactions is set to n, then it results in only n shipment / wave / container (whichever is selected as the Primary Task Reference) in a batch. Invalid setup if 'max transactions' is specified but 'PrimaryTaskReference' is not defined.
Attribute.Name: Primary_Batch_Reference

Attribute.Description: Y if separate batch needs to be created for tasks requiring picking from multiple areas. If Y, tasks requiring multiple area picking can be batched together.
Attribute.Name: Separate_Multi_Area_Batches

Attribute.Description: If specified, all open tasks for the attribute will be batched together.
Attribute.Name: Do_Not_Split_Attribute

Attribute.Description: Equipment type is used move product within a warehouse (eg Cart).
Attribute.Name: Equipment_Type

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores list of all tasks across nodes. Tasks represent a logical or a physical activity. Every task must belong to a task type, which identifies the type of activity.
Entity.Name: Task

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_TASK table.
Attribute.Name: Task_Key

Attribute.Description: The one up number that uniquely identifies the task. This is system generated.
Attribute.Name: Task_Id

Attribute.Description: The ship node's organization code.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The task type that the user is eligible to perform.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: The enterprise key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the parent task of this task.
Attribute.Name: Parent_Task_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag allows distinguishing between multi-user tasks and multi-user subtasks.
Attribute.Name: Is_Parent

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the predecessor task. The predecessaor task should be completed or canceled prior to suggesting this task.
Attribute.Name: Predecessor_Task_Id

Attribute.Description: The tasks that were suggested to the user as one consolidated task. This is system generated.
Attribute.Name: Consolidated_Task_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the task is a summary task.
Attribute.Name: Is_Summary_Task

Attribute.Description: The location at which the movement of a product starts in a warehouse.
Attribute.Name: Source_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The Zone corresponding to the source location. Denormalized here for better performance.
Attribute.Name: Source_Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: The Aisle corresponding to the source location. Denormalized here for better performance.
Attribute.Name: Source_Aisle

Attribute.Description: The location at which the task ends. This may be overridden during execution.
Attribute.Name: Target_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The Zone corresponding to the target location. Denormalized here for better performance.
Attribute.Name: Target_Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: The Aisle corresponding to the target location. Denormalized here for better performance.
Attribute.Name: Target_Aisle

Attribute.Description: The sequence of the source sort. This should be passed to the createTask or changeTask API. This information is used by the getNextTask API to prioritize the task suggestion in a list of tasks.
Attribute.Name: Source_Sort_Sequence

Attribute.Description: The sequence of the target sort. This should be passed to the createTask or changeTask API. This information is used by the getNextTask API.
Attribute.Name: Target_Sort_Sequence

Attribute.Description: The priority within the tasks of a specific task type.
Attribute.Name: Task_Priority

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the time by which a task has to be completed. Tasks that are past or near their expected completion time are suggested first.
Attribute.Name: Finish_No_Later_Than

Attribute.Description: The time before which a task should not be started. Tasks are suggested only after the start no earlier than time is past.
Attribute.Name: Start_No_Earlier_Than

Attribute.Description: The user to whom this task is assigned.
Attribute.Name: Assigned_To_User_Id

Attribute.Description: The user to whom this task is assigned manually.
Attribute.Name: Manually_Assigned_User_Id

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the item for which the task is created.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The product class ofthe item.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure of the item.
Attribute.Name: Unit_Of_Measure

Attribute.Description: The first item classification for the task.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification1

Attribute.Description: The second item classification for the task.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification2

Attribute.Description: The third item classification for the task.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification3

Attribute.Description: The Case Id or Pallet Id for the task.
Attribute.Name: Source_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The system defined values for the type of LPN. The types that are currently supported are CASE and PALLET.
Attribute.Name: Source_LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: The target Case Id or Target Pallet Id for the task.
Attribute.Name: Target_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: This indicates that the LPN is selected for this task and system cannot consider this LPN for other demands. This information is useful during task execution where system can warn the user if he picks a different LPN.
Attribute.Name: Suggested_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The system defined values for the type of LPN. The types that are currently supported are CASE and PALLET.
Attribute.Name: Target_LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: The tag number of the item.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: The serial number of the item.
Attribute.Name: Serial_No

Attribute.Description: The segment type. SKUs are sometimes custom made. This field stores the customization details.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: The segment number. When inventory is customized for a specific order, it needs to be tracked separately so that it can be allocated to that order.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: The status of the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: The quantity for which the task is created.
Attribute.Name: Quantity

Attribute.Description: The quantity that was over picked during picking operation.
Attribute.Name: Over_Picked_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The receipt header key that is associated with this task. This links the task to the receipt information. When a QC recall is made for a specific shipment, it may be required to cancel any open task against the receipt. This link between the task and the receipt enables you to do that.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The date by which the shipment has to be shipped.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: The status of the task. Following are the values of task status: * 1050: Draft * 1100: Open * 1200: Suggested * 1300: In Progress * 1400: Held * 2000: Completed * 9000: Canceled.
Attribute.Name: Task_Status

Attribute.Description: A date based inventory attribute that helps understand the order in which stock arrived at the node. This is used to send out items that arrived earlier than the ones that arrived later.
Attribute.Name: Fifo_No

Attribute.Description: The country in which the item was manufactured.
Attribute.Name: Country_Of_Origin

Attribute.Description: The specific equipment that is used to perform this task.
Attribute.Name: Equipment_Id

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the location associated with the location placeholder for the equipment, so that inventory in the location can be queried and tracked.
Attribute.Name: Equipment_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an exception has been detected. The exception may be system detected or user detected. Y: Exception has been detected. Exception hold reason will give the details of why the task is held. N: No prevailing exception. Once the exception is resolved, it is set to N. This attribute is used to hold the task if inventory shortage is detected by system. It is also used when supervisors want to hold tasks for operational reasons.
Attribute.Name: Exception_Hold

Attribute.Description: The reason for the hold, if the task is held due to an exception. The system will ship with one system defined value for this field: Y01: Inventory Shortage. Users can add more reasons during installation. Example values are: 02: Equipment malfunction 03: Location Repair.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: A description of the reason, if the task is held by an explicit user action.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Reason_Text

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the predecessor of the current task is not yet complete, and therefore this task is held. When the predecessor task is completed, the successor tasks are released from hold by setting this flag to N.
Attribute.Name: Dependency_Hold

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the task requires batching.
Attribute.Name: Batch_Hold

Attribute.Description: The order number.
Attribute.Name: Order_No

Attribute.Description: The receipt number.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_No

Attribute.Description: The document type to which the task belongs.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The number of the release.
Attribute.Name: Release_No

Attribute.Description: The prime line number. This is a part of the unique key of the line.
Attribute.Name: Prime_Line_No

Attribute.Description: The sub line number. This is a part of the unique key of the line.
Attribute.Name: Sub_Line_No

Attribute.Description: The order header key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The order line key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Order_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The order release key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Order_Release_Key

Attribute.Description: The wave to which this task belongs.
Attribute.Name: Wave_No

Attribute.Description: The shipment number of the task.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_No

Attribute.Description: The container number.
Attribute.Name: Container_No

Attribute.Description: The shipment line key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The shipment container key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Container_Key

Attribute.Description: The shipment key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: The batch number to which this task belongs.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: The batch key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Batch_Key

Attribute.Description: The carrier organization code.
Attribute.Name: Scac

Attribute.Description: The load number.
Attribute.Name: Load_No

Attribute.Description: The bill of lading number.
Attribute.Name: Bol_No

Attribute.Description: The trailer number by which the shipment leaves the node.
Attribute.Name: Trailer_No

Attribute.Description: An attribute used to store manifest number assigned by carrier server.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_No

Attribute.Description: The move request key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The move request within the context of a module for a node.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_No

Attribute.Description: The move request line key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The count request key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Count_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The name of the count program for which the count request is created.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Name

Attribute.Description: The identifier of a count request along with Document type and Node.
Attribute.Name: Count_Request_No

Attribute.Description: A work order within the context of a node and enterprise.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_No

Attribute.Description: The work order key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this task. Since operations vary for each node, task type level attributes are maintained at a node level.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The reason code for the change, if the task is changed (like priority).
Attribute.Name: Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: A description of the reason, if the task is changed (like priority).
Attribute.Name: Reason_Text

Attribute.Description: The productivity key that is associated with this task.
Attribute.Name: Productivity_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the task is consolidated.
Attribute.Name: Is_Consolidated_Task

Attribute.Description: The time stamp of when the task status is changed to InProgress.
Attribute.Name: Start_Time_Stamp

Attribute.Description: The time stamp of when the task status is changed to completed or cancelled.
Attribute.Name: End_Time_Stamp

Attribute.Description: The sequence of the reference sort. This forms a parameter in prioritizing the tasks in a list of tasks during suggestion.
Attribute.Name: Reference_Sort_Sequence

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the task was made held due to inventory shortage.
Attribute.Name: Held_For_Inventory_Shortage

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the task was made held due to target location's capacity constraints.
Attribute.Name: Held_For_Capacity_Constraints

Attribute.Description: This is the enterprise to which the ownership will be transferred on the completion of the task.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Org_To_Transfer

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the root task whose execution led to the creation of this task.
Attribute.Name: Root_Task_Id

Attribute.Description: For Voice Based Task Execution, we have integrated with External Voice System Voxware(VLP). As Part of the integration the Task has to be updated with Assignment Number. Assignment on VLP represents a group of Tasks that are executed together in a trip. This column represents the Assignment on VLP.
Attribute.Name: Assignment_No

Attribute.Description: The status of the assignment to which task belongs.
Attribute.Name: Assign_Status

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the PLA rule that got used to create this Task. This field will be stamped for Outbound Pick tasks, Replenishment Tasks and Retrieval Tasks.
Attribute.Name: Pla_Zone_Set_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table contains the applicable task references for each tak type group.
Entity.Name: Task_Reference

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute.
Attribute.Name: Task_Reference_Key

Attribute.Description: Activity group to which reference belongs to.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: It is a reference name that will be passed to the task.
Attribute.Name: Task_Reference

Attribute.Description: Y: Indicates this reference is System Defined and should not be allowed to change. N: This is a user defined Reference.
Attribute.Name: System_Defined

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Stores task status change audit. Each time the task status changes because of a business process, an audit is posted along with the status, timestamp, reason code and text, user ID and program ID.
Entity.Name: Task_Status_Audit

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_TASK_STATUS_AUDIT table.
Attribute.Name: Task_Status_Audit_Key

Attribute.Description: Task for which a status change audit is written.
Attribute.Name: Task_Key

Attribute.Description: Status of the task before the status change.
Attribute.Name: Old_Status

Attribute.Description: Status of the task after the status change.
Attribute.Name: New_Status

Attribute.Description: Reason code indicating the reason for the status change.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: Free-form reason text indicating any additional information related to the status change.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Text

Attribute.Description: The id of the system user that created this audit record.
Attribute.Name: User_Id

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores different types of tasks performed in a warehouse. Different task types typically represent tasks that are physically different. For instance, paper based putaway as opposed to RF based putaway.
Entity.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_TASK_TYPE table.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type_Key

Attribute.Description: The owner organization of the node for which this task type is defined.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the task type. Typically, this would be a short two-digit code.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: The activities performed in a warehouse are grouped in an activity group Id. For example, PUTAWAY. Activity groups are system defined.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: The code of the activity within the Activity Group. For example, STORAGE. This is system defined.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Code

Attribute.Description: The descriptive name of the task type. This is used to display data in drop-downs in the user interface, wherever the user can select a task type.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type_Name

Attribute.Description: The priority of this task type over other task types. This priority controls the order in which tasks are suggested to a user. Priority 1 will get suggested before Priority 2, and so on. Tasks are suggested in ascending order of task type priority (there are several other factors that influence the order in which tasks are suggested).
Attribute.Name: Task_Type_Priority

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to execute tasks through drop off locations. Y: indicates that this type of task is physically broken up by drop off locations (on system, this does not automatically translate into multiple tasks). N: indicates that this type of task is carried out without being broken up into drop-off locations. That is, product is carried directly from origin to destination without being stopped at drop off locations. This information is used by createTask API: If this is set to Y, and pick method is not 'pick to pallet', then tasks are created split by drop off location (drop off chaining). Putaway RF screen: if this is Y, then it displays the drop off location on pick screen if that drop off location is different from the target location on the task. updateTaskStatus API: when status is moved to PICKED, then if the task needs to be split, then internally, createTask API is called, which considers this rule.
Attribute.Name: Exec_Tasks_Thru_Dropoff

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether over picking of inventory is allowed.
Attribute.Name: Allow_Over_Picking

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether putaway can be performed on an ad hoc basis.
Attribute.Name: Is_Ad_Hoc_Move

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether more than one user can perform the task.
Attribute.Name: Allow_Multiple_Users

Attribute.Description: The suggestion for the source task. 01: User sequenced User is presented with a set of tasks, and the user selects the order in which they are done 02: System sequenced System presents the user with tasks one by one, and the user has to perform them in that order (override possible).
Attribute.Name: Source_Task_Suggestion

Attribute.Description: The sequence in which to order the source task. 01: Move-In Sequence. Typically, this is used during putaway. 02: Move-out Sequence. Typically, this is used during replenishment and order picking.
Attribute.Name: Source_Task_Order_By

Attribute.Description: The suggestion for the target task. 01: User sequenced - User is presented with a set of deposit tasks, and the user selects the order in which deposit is done 02: System sequenced - System presents the user with deposit tasks one by one, and the user has to deposit in that order (override possible).
Attribute.Name: Target_Task_Suggestion

Attribute.Description: The sequence in which to order target tasks. 01: Move-In Sequence Typically, this is used during putaway. 02: Move-out Sequence Typically, this is used during replenishment and order picking.
Attribute.Name: Target_Task_Order_By

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether tasks need to be batched on creation.Y: When tasks are created, they need to be batched and printed. This typically represents a paper based process, but it may also represent an RF based process. N: No batching required This information is used by createTask API: When tasks are created, if this flag is Y, then they are 'Held for batching'.
Attribute.Name: Batch_Required

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether tasks are held in creation. Tasks held on creation may be released manually later. This information is used by the createTask API. When tasks are created, if this flag is Y, then they are 'Held for batching'.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Task_On_Creation

Attribute.Description: The batch rule key that is associated with this task type.
Attribute.Name: Batch_Rule_Key

Attribute.Description: The number of users who can be suggested tasks of this task type and primary task reference combination.
Attribute.Name: Max_Users_Allowed

Attribute.Description: The smallest group of tasks that need to be kept together for a particular user. For instance, in the case of strict order pick, user picks one shipment at a time. In such a case, if the first task that is suggested to a user has shipment number A, then all other tasks belonging to that shipment number must be suggested only to that user. In order to accomplish this, system automatically creates a temporary user level transaction constraint for this shipment.
Attribute.Name: Primary_Task_Reference

Attribute.Description: The rate at which tasks of this task type are executed. The rate can be either the number of tasks per hour or in units per hour, as specified in standard rate unit of measure. It is derived from allowed minutes per task column in YFS_PRODUCTIVITY_TYPE table.
Attribute.Name: Standard_Rate

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure at which tasks of this task type are executed. The rate can be either number of tasks per hour or in units per hour.
Attribute.Name: Standard_Rate_Uom

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the tasks belonging to this task type have the granularity of variance.
Attribute.Name: Is_Granularity_Variance

Attribute.Description: The outbound case Id or pallet Id into which the item is picked.
Attribute.Name: Pick_Into_Outbound_Container

Attribute.Description: The case Id or pallet Id into which products are picked directly.
Attribute.Name: Pick_Into_Inventory_Container

Attribute.Description: The containerization scheme.
Attribute.Name: Containerization_Scheme

Attribute.Description: The pick strategy used.
Attribute.Name: Pick_Strategy

Attribute.Description: Indicates the Voice Work Flow to be used to execute the Tasks belonging to this Task Type.
Attribute.Name: Voice_Work_Flow_Id

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this task type. Since operations vary for each node, task type level attributes are maintained at a node level.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The productivity type to which this Task type is associated. It is possible that a task type can not have a productivity type associated.
Attribute.Name: Productivity_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to restrict picking in a trip to a target zone.
Attribute.Name: Pick_To_Target_Zone

Attribute.Description: The device that executes the task.
Attribute.Name: Execution_Device

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to pack while picking.
Attribute.Name: Pack_While_Pick

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whetherto apply the identification label.
Attribute.Name: Apply_Identification_Label

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to pick into a container.
Attribute.Name: Pick_Into_Container

Attribute.Description: The out-staging task type.
Attribute.Name: Out_Staging_Task_Type

Attribute.Description: The In-staging task type.
Attribute.Name: In_Staging_Task_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to display a warning message when the depositing location is different from the suggested.
Attribute.Name: Suppress_Warn_On_Locn_Override

Attribute.Description: Identifies the equipment type that would be typically be used to perform the task of this type. This is used in resource planning. Even if multiple equipments types may be used, planning is done using this equipment type.
Attribute.Name: Primary_Equipment_Type

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier of a resource, which will be used for a task type. This resource will override the default resource associated with the task type.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Id_Override

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that tasks can be performed using selected equipment type only.
Attribute.Name: Perf_Task_Using_Equip_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether display each sku while deposit.
Attribute.Name: Display_Each_Sku

Entity.Description: This table stores task types that a user group performs. System should suggest only those task to the user that belong to one of the task types specified here. If no task types have been specified, it means that any type of task can be suggested to the user.
Entity.Name: User_Task_Type

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute.
Attribute.Name: User_Task_Type_Key

Attribute.Description: node's Organization Code.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Data Security Group Id.
Attribute.Name: Data_Security_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: Identifies the task type that the user is eligible to perform.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: Specifies the priority of the task type for the current user. Tasks that belong to a task type of numerically lower priority are suggested first.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type_Priority

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores transactional constraints, such as order number and shipment number. Transactional constraints are temporary in nature, and are automatically purged by the system when the corresponding transaction data is purged. When tasks are suggested to a user, these constraints have to be met. If no constraints are specified here, it means that any type of task can be suggested to the user.
Entity.Name: User_Tran_Constraints

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_USER_TRAN_CONSTRAINTS table.
Attribute.Name: User_Tran_Constraints_Key

Attribute.Description: The node to which the user belongs.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the user for whom the transactional constraints are being defined.
Attribute.Name: Assigned_To_User_Id

Attribute.Description: The enterprise key that is associated with this user tran constraints. Within a Node, operations can vary by Enterprise. Therefore, task type level attributes are maintained at an enterprise level for a node.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the task type that the user is eligible to perform.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: The batch in which the user can work.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: The shipment on which the user can work.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_No

Attribute.Description: The container in which the user is eligibile to work.
Attribute.Name: Container_No

Attribute.Description: The receipt on which the user is eligible to work.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_No

Attribute.Description: The work order on which the user is eligible to work.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_No

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the constraint should be applied.
Attribute.Name: Active_Flag

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table has information regarding the resource corresponding to an activity group.
Entity.Name: Activity_Grp_Res_Ref

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Grp_Res_Ref_Key

Attribute.Description: Every task type must belong to a task type group. Task Type Groups are sytem defined.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier of a resource.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Id

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid
